entry.source: 〉 The demons are no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demons are no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A voice can be heard coming from{F801}somewhere...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A voice can be heard coming from{F801}somewhere...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F813,1,412207}This is His Excellency's castle...{F801}And you are uninvited guests.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F813,1,412207}This is His Excellency's castle...{F801}And you are uninvited guests.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F813,1,461008}...There is no need for us to show{F801}ourselves.{F801}{F802}Wander the Hall of Eternity, leaving{F801}behind only your unsightly corpse.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F813,1,461008}...There is no need for us to show{F801}ourselves.{F801}{F802}Wander the Hall of Eternity, leaving{F801}behind only your unsightly corpse.{F801}
